comment: Our Country is slowly Transforming into a rd Turd World Shithole not unlike that of Africa where Murder by Knives, Machetes, Etc. is Commonplace & Whites are always the Victims. You take said Guns away, & our Women, Children & Elderly, are nothing more than Lambs to the Slaughter...
amr:
# ::snt Our Country is slowly Transforming into a rd Turd World Shithole not unlike that of Africa where Murder by Knives, Machetes, Etc. is Commonplace & Whites are always the Victims. You take said Guns away, & our Women, Children & Elderly, are nothing more than Lambs to the Slaughter...
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (t / transform-01
            :ARG1 (c / country
                  :poss (w / we))
            :ARG2 (w2 / world
                  :mod (t2 / turd)
                  :mod (r / rd))
            :ARG1-of (s / slow-05)
            :ARG1-of (r2 / resemble-01
                  :polarity -
                  :ARG2 (w3 / world
                        :location (c2 / continent
                              :name (n / name
                                    :op1 "Africa")
                              :location-of (a / and
                                    :op1 (s2 / share-01
                                          :ARG1 (m2 / murder-01
                                                :ARG0 (a2 / and
                                                      :op1 (p / person
                                                            :ARG1-of (k / knife-01))
                                                      :op2 (m3 / machete)
                                                      :op3 (e / et-cetera)))))
                              :op2 (p2 / person
                                    :ARG1-of (v / victimize-01
                                          :time (a3 / always))
                                    :domain (p3 / person
                                          :ARG1-of (w4 / white-02)))))))
      :snt2 (a4 / and
            :op1 (t3 / take-away-05
                  :ARG0 (y / you)
                  :ARG1 (g / gun
                        :ARG1-of (s3 / say-01)))
            :op2 (h / have-mod-91
                  :ARG1 (a5 / and
                        :op1 (w5 / woman
                              :poss (w6 / we))
                        :op2 (c3 / child
                              :poss w6)
                        :op3 (p4 / person
                              :mod (e2 / elderly)
                              :poss w6))
                  :ARG2 (l / lamb
                        :prep-to (s4 / Slaughter-01)
                        :mod (m4 / more
                              :polarity -)))))

comment: Please curb the negative thoughts that are offensive to others.
amr:
# ::snt Please curb the negative thoughts that are offensive to others.
(c / curb-01
      :mode imperative
      :polite +
      :ARG0 (y / you)
      :ARG1 (t / think-01
            :ARG0 y
            :ARG0-of (n / negative-02)
            :ARG0-of (o / offend-01
                  :ARG1 (p / person
                        :mod (o2 / other)))))

comment: The "n word" and the accompanying racism are toxic to civilized debate and so are not permitted here.
amr:
# ::snt The "n word" and the accompanying racism are toxic to civilized debate and so are not permitted here.
(t / toxic
      :domain (a / and
            :op1 (s / string-entity
                  :value "n")
            :op2 (r / racism
                  :ARG0-of (a2 / accompany-01)))
      :prep-to (d / debate-01
            :ARG1-of (c / civilize-01))
      :ARG0-of (c2 / cause-01
            :ARG1 (p / permit-01
                  :polarity -
                  :ARG1 a
                  :location (h / here))))

comment: Please refrain from using derogatory terms for people of any race
amr:
# ::snt Please refrain from using derogatory terms for people of any race
(r / refrain-01
      :mode imperative
      :polite +
      :ARG0 (y / you)
      :ARG1 (u / use-01
            :ARG0 y
            :ARG1 (t / term
                  :mod (d / derogatory))
            :ARG2 (p / person
                  :mod (r2 / race
                        :mod (a / any)))))
